title: Ashe Broken
body: Seriously i've just played a few games against the new ashe and she is broken. Ashe came back from from the workshop ready to give noobs pentakills and  kill streaks. Even if you use heavy attack damage champions like yasuo or zed she doesn't even lose health.

replies.body:
So first, people wanted Ashe to be buffed/rework.

Now they wanted her nerfed back.

https://imgflip.com/s/meme/Captain-Picard-Facepalm.jpg

i think he means in the sense that if she has a bloodthirster, plus the the crazy AA speed steroid, along with the flurry active....the amount of health she lifesteals is unreal. with a full build she can lifesteal like 1,000hp in a matter of like 4 AA's or so. i see his point. it IS kind of insane when you think about it. b\c her flurry counts as individual AA's, i believe, which means lifesteal applies to every one
lol ashe didnt receive anything that stopped her from losing health
